markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Targeting Shot](/Feats.aspx?ID=533) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Press" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=133" />
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 176 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Hunter's Aim](/Feats.aspx?ID=496)

</column>

---

You carefully track your prey’s position and defenses, allowing you to follow up around obstacles that block your shot. Make a ranged weapon Strike against your hunted prey. You ignore the target’s concealed condition and all cover.
name: Targeting Shot
